name: Un-Stable (Lychees)
description:
Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys: Move, Crouch, Jump

SPACE (hold): Fire

ESC: Exit

---------

A 2d arcade shooter made using bad clip-art! Shoot down the enemy stable while avoiding the obstacles it throws at you.

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 49! Some friends helped me brainstorm but I ended up doing most of it solo.

The gameplay was sort of inspired by Cuphead, I basically wanted to make a bad clipart version of it. If I had more time I would have made the different phases more intricate and have more variety of weapon drops (and probably made some actual art), but overall I think it turned out well.

--------

Credits:

Music: Cxong - https://opengameart.org/content/lasso-lady-seamless-loop

Art: Clipart library

SFX: Stock sounds, Juhani Junkala - Essential Retro Video Game Sound Effects
